9.ara-name: كتاب الحج عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ibn Abi Ammar said:"I asked Jabir bin Abdullah: 'Is the hyena game?' He said: 'Yes'" He said: "I said: 'Can it be eaten?' He said: 'Yes.'" He said: "I said: 'Did the Messenger of Allah say that?' He said: 'Yes

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الضَّبُعِ يُصِيبُهَا الْمُحْرِمُ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About A Badger Killed By A Muhrim
